00037 enum RegPayloadType {
00038     RegNoNode        ,
00039     RegBooleanNode   ,
00040     RegStringNode    ,
00041     RegIntegerNode   ,
00042     RegBlobNode      ,
00043     RegBlobFileNode  ,
00044     RegInteriorNode

00048 struct RegNodeFileHeader {
00049        RegFileHeader m_file_header;
00050        CHAR m_uri[c_reg_uri_size_max];
00051 };
00052 
00054 struct RegNodeRecord {
00055        CHAR m_name[c_reg_node_name_size_max];
00056        struct {
00057            UINT16 m_payload_type; // mimetype of payload (see above table)
00058            UINT16 m_offset_node_payload; //offset of payload (max = 64 KB)
00059        } m_payload_bits;
00060 };

00071 @code
00072   +-->   +-------------------------------------------------------------------+
00073   |      | 0 1 2 3 4 5 6 7| 0 1 2 3 4 5 6 7| 0 1 2 3 4 5 6 7| 0 1 2 3 4 5 6 7|
00074   |      +----------------+----------------+----------------+----------------+
00075   |      |     Version    |    File Type   |         Node Count (n)          |
00076   |      +----------------+----------------+---------------------------------+
00077   |      |                         .                                         |
00078 Header   |                         .                                         |
00079   |      |                         URI (255 Bytes)                           |
00080   |      |                         .                                         |
00081   |      |                         .                                         |
00082   |      |                                                                   |
00083   |      |                                                  +----------------+
00084   |      |                                                  |                |
00085   +-->   +--------------------------------------------------+----------------+
00086   |      |                        .                                          |
00087   |      |                        Node Name (50 Bytes) (Node 1)              |
00088   |      |                        .        +---------------------------------+
00089   |      |                                 |                                 |
00090   |      +---------------------------------+---------------------------------+
00091   |      |          Payload Type           |         Payload Offset          |--------+
00092   |      +---------------------------------+---------------------------------+        |
00093  Node    |                           .                                       |        |
00094 Records  |                           .                                       |        |
00095   |      |                           .                                       |        |
00096   |      +-------------------------------------------------------------------+        |
00097   |      |                        .                                          |        |
00098   |      |                        Node Name (50 Bytes) (Node n)              |        |
00099   |      |                        .        +---------------------------------+        |
00100   |      |                                 |                                 |        |
00101   |      +---------------------------------+---------------------------------+        |
00102   |      |          Payload Type           |         Payload Offset          |-----+  |
00103   +-->   +-------------------------------------------------------------------+     |  |
00104   |      |                                                                   |     |  |
00105   |      |                           .                                       |     |  |
00106   |      |                                                                   |     |  |
00107   |      |                                                                   |     |  |
00108   |      |                                                                   |     |  |
00109   |      |                                                                   |     |  |
00110   |      |                                                          +--------+-----+  |
00111   |      |                                                          |        |        |
00112   |      |                                                          V        |        |
00113   |      +-------------------------------------------------------------------+        |
00114 Payload  |                           Payload n                               |        |
00115   |      |                                                                   |        |
00116   |      +-------------------------------------------------------------------+        |
00117   |      |   .                                                               |        |
00118   |      |   .                          +------------------------------------+--------+
00119   |      |   .                          |                                    |
00120   |      |   .                          V                                    |
00121   |      +-------------------------------------------------------------------+
00122   |      |                          Payload 1                                |
00123   |      |                                                                   |
00124   +-->   +-------------------------------------------------------------------+
00125 @endcode
00126 */
